Professional service and competitive pricing!  Thanks so much to Jay and her attention to detail!!

name: Joanna Shettler
text: A huge thank you to Brown Cleaning Services for all their help with some of my rental homes. The response time is amazing and the finished product was perfect. I will continue to use this company for the rental homes I manage in this area. Highly recommended!!!!

name: Sammy
text: This is the best company i have ever used and would recommend 10x over. Brown services has been a big life saver for me. I work 40+ hours a week as well as my husband and we have two kids. Between work and trying to spend what little free time we do get with our kids our home tends to get disorganized throughout the week, but ever since Brown services came into our lives, our home remains spotless and organized despite the destruction of our two year old. We use Brown services every two weeks and sometimes once a week. Very professional, extremely punctual, friendly , and communicates well when explaining what type of services you are looking for. Prices are reasonable and i don’t think I’d use anyone else. We are beyond bless to have Jay and we recommend you try Brown services as well. You won’t be disappointed

name: Carol Schablow
text: This service company deserves strong praises for their meticulous focus on cleaning thoroughly every nook and cranny. They did all that I asked, and much more. My place was spotless! I'm highly impressed & definitely will use them for all detailed cleaning needs in the future.

text: Brown Cleaning Services is the absolute BEST!!!! Very professional, thorough, and efficient! I just love Zeljka, her spirit is so warm and welcoming. Highly recommend!!!

text: These Ladies showed up ontime and prepared to work! We were a little out of there service area but they let us schedule them anyway on short notice. They did a tremendous job Deep cleaning out industrial kitchen area and gave us pointers to keep it clean until the next scheduled professional cleaning. We liked the fact that the owner Mrs. Zeljka was onsite an actually did  alot of the cleaning. We highly recommend this company and will use them again

name: Hack Meister
text: I had them come out for a serious deep cleaning! Price was good and they did a Super job! Will use again!

name: Constance Gray
text: I rarely post reviews but I had to give a shout out to this awesome company! I recently just moved to Maryland and was in a hurry to get my home ready for sell. Luckily I found Brown Cleaning Services and they just saved the day! From the beginning they explained the process, offered a reasonable price, and provided great communication. I own two fur babies and at times they can be a little messy. Brown was able to clean so well that you didn't know any pets lived in my home.  I highly recommend this company. Thank you!! Rocko and Chubbs say hi!

name: Claudia Driver
text: Mrs. Zeljka cleaned my house weekly before I moved away from Birmingham for work. She was highly recommended to me by a coworker and kept my house spotless. Aside from the weekly standard cleaning tasks, I really appreciated her for additional deep cleaning jobs like window cleaning, kitchen cabinets, baseboards and all the other things that I didn’t have time to get around to. When we moved Mrs. Zeljka got our house pretty and clean for sell. I wish I could’ve took her with us.

name: Carmarion D. Anderson-Harvey
text: OMG! The Brown Cleaning Service, LLC, is the best service on this side of heaven. The owners and their team members are the best at communicating, extremely attentive to accuracy and detail, and thorough workers. They operate an honest business who not out in the world, to take advantage of customers. They have a pure and passionate art towards cleaning. Not to mention, their prices were the best on the market. They did not quote me an estimate over the phone; instead came out, provided a walk-through, and took the time to inspect the property and offered me an exact quote.  I was amazed by how in-expensive they charged and my response, are you sure? They said, Yes! Overall, if you are looking for a business that will provide you with A+ service that is inclusive to all people, and down-to-earth with a passion for cleaning, you have found the right company. As a personal note to the owners, Mr. & Mrs. Brown, I applaud you!  For a professional responsible for equality work across Alabama, thank you for being inclusive and offering your services to LGBTQ+ Alabamians.

name: mike taranto
text:
Called and discussed service. Staff was friendly. They were to have their customer service call to get price and schedule. After we hung up I got the following email:

Hello, Mr. Taranto. Thank you for reaching out! It sounds like your tenant may need the services of a company that handles more "heavy-duty" cleaning.

They offer deep cleaning on their website. Thought this was poor.

resp.text: Hello, Mike~ We do not handle pest infestations, or rodent urine and feces. We'd hoped to be helpful to you by taking a moment to point you in the direction of a company that is equipped to serve your needs and has the proper cleaning products, equipment, and protective gear to address biohazardous waste. We're sorry that you took offense to our recommendation and wish you all the best.

name: Meg Walton
text: I had the best experience with this company and with Nicole. First, their website is user friendly. Second, they had next day availability! Last, Nicole was delightful to have in the house and she left it sparkling. I have no criticism of the company or Nicole. Excellent experience and I will use them again.

resp.text: Hi Meg.  Thank you so much for the review!  We truly appreciate your feedback and will be sure to let Nicole know as well!

name: Missy Zak
text: Moving is stressful enough - even when you have service providers assisting - but Maids a la Mode took a huge burden off my shoulders. Cynthia and her crew worked into the night to get my house spotless for listing pics the next day. They had an incredible work ethic, aptitude and attitude. They truly saved my day and did it with a smile. I highly recommend this business and their professional team. Thank you!

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Missy!

name: Donna Brannen
text:
Bad communication problem, never got my house cleaned even though I booked it 6 weeks out.

Yes she had called to say she was in an accident on Friday the day it was scheduled. She called 2 hours after appointment to tell me this. She rescheduled for Monday morning
July 5, and on Sunday July 4th at 6pm she called to tell me she didn't have a car and could not get a rental in time. I was offered for a reschedule but my company was coming July 4 that evening. So it was too late then. Just bad experience from the get go as I had the appointment scheduled 6 weeks in advance. Never has a problem with the company before.

resp.text:
Hello Donna, We are so very sorry that your cleaner was unable to service your home. As you know, she was in an auto accident, and unfortunately was unable to service your home as scheduled. Being the 4th of July holiday, we were completely booked and unable to send a replacement. We'd hoped you would be open to rescheduling the following business day, but understand that your service was time sensitive. Thank you for the opportunity and we hope you know how sorry we are that you did not receive the service you'd been anticipating and looking forward to having.

Kind regards,
The Maids a la Mode Team

name: John Rand (John Rand the Handyman)
text: Great local business! Maids a la Mode handles all of my Airbnb turnovers and our personal residence as well. I refer them to my customers in my business, John Rand the Handyman, at least once a week. 100% dependable and high quality cleaning professionals!

resp.text: Thank you, John! We appreciate your business and confidence in our cleaning professionals!

name: Darcy Symes
text:
Ive used Maids a la Mode for going on about 8 years and would never think of trying another company! The cleaners they send are always top rate and very responsive to my needs.

Today Christina cleaned my oven (which I shamefully admit hadn't been cleaned in Well over a year (with lots of bubbling-over sweet potatoes during that time!) and she was happy to use a safe non-toxic product instead of the intense chemicals in standard oven cleaners - and a lot of elbow grease for sure. It’s so clean and PRETTY I just want to stare at it!  Great work all around. Highly recommend.

resp.text: Hi Darcy! Thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback!

name: Dymplez Key
text: I'm sorry but this company is very unorganized. I worked for this company and the owner does not respect her employees at all and she is not truthful with her word. Most of the providers never wanted to work and the operations and sales was always having to fix there mistakes. The owner is very rude and try to act like she cares but was very rude to her employees. The company does not offer proper training and if you ask for help the owner had an attitude and try to throw you off on another employee. Please find a more organized company because this one is not it. If I could give advice ton anyone looking at this company my advice is RUNNNNNNNNNNN and I mean that from a very passionate place. One star is only because I had to rate them because this company was getting a 0.

resp.text:
Ms. Key– As discussed, we did not renew your 30-day contract as Customer Service support because you did not meet the basic skills required to work with our company. Discourtesy and lack of professionalism in dealing with our valued Customers, basic spelling, grammar and written communication deficiencies, and the inability to follow clear, written instructions led to our decision not to renew your contract.

In order to honor our Agreement with you, we paid your fee in full through the end of your contract. But, in light of your professional shortcomings and deficiencies, we could not in good faith renew your contract or expend the additional company resources required to teach you the fundamentals we were under the impression you already possessed, per your resume.

We understand that after having been unable to secure work for one year prior to this, you had hoped this might be a longer-term engagement. After 60 hours of paid orientation and the considerable company resources allocated, we'd hoped for a longer-term engagement as well. Unfortunately, we simply do not have confidence in your ability to interact with and be of service to our valued Customers at this time.

text: We've had experience with other cleaners in the area and Maids a la Mode is by far the most reliable and client-centered. resp.text: What kind words! Thank you for allowing us to be of service to your organization, the Mobile Arts Council, which does such a great service for our community! We appreciate you!

name: Tarah Keech
text:
I ADORE Maids a la Mode! We've been with them for over a year now, regular recurring service and have worked with many of their team members. My husband and I are consistently delighted by the care they give our home and how good it feels to come home after they've been there.
We have had experience with other services here and in other cities but have never worked with another agency who is as easy to do business with, as professional about their online booking and appointment management, or who does a job this great every single time.
I highly recommend Maids a la Mode! In fact, now that I'm thinking about it, it may be what everyone gets for Christmas this year :D

resp.text: You just brought big smiles to our faces, Tarah!  :) Having customers like you make us love our work!

text: I’ve been using Maids a la Mode for three weeks now and I highly recommend their service.   It’s so nice to have the  house cleaned without having to do it all myself, especially the floors and bathrooms!  Brianna does an excellent job.  I was home on her last visit and very impressed with how organized and professional she was and all she got done in a short amount of time.  If you’re thinking about getting a cleaning service, try Maids a la Mode - it’s well worth the money!

text: I took advantage of a quickie offer and I love that.  Spur of the moment thing but I had already been thinking about booking another service anyway. text: i would give ten stars if that were possible!  We have used this cleaning service for two years and every experience has been positive.  Not only do they leave my house in sparkling condition, they always are so friendly & upbeat that they are a pleasure to welcome into our home.  In the instances when I have needed to reschedule an appointment, they have always accommodated us without complaints.  It is obvious that the culture in this company is one of doing their best to satisfy every client, every time.  Maids a la Mode  is, without a doubt, the best cleaning service in this area!

text: I am not overly impressed with this past cleaning. I have a fairly clean home with no clutter in main living areas that needed a "spring cleaning". I was initially satisfied with the service, but after my swiffer duster audit, I am slightly disappointed this go 'round. Overall 3.5 stars because they are responsive, punctual, flexible, and visible areas were cleaned thoroughly, not to mention my home smelled great. However this rush job was obvious with minor inconsistencies that aren't dealbreakers but frustrating.

resp.text: If you could kindly return our call, we would love to hear back and would be more than happy for the opportunity to make things right for you. We certainly appreciate your feedback as it helps us be the best we can be. Thank you, Chanda. Our number again is (251) 298-8007.

text: This company is on time all the time even let you know days in advance when they will be there they show up when they say they will paying the bill is a simple as receiving a receipt through email thank you

text: I have used Maids à la Mode in the past and thought they were a good and reasonable. An incidence occurred that I did not agree with regarding service. The incidence was resolved and I felt that there was a definite concern with the company in regards to meeting the customer's expectations! I will definite you use again in the near future because of the concern shown during the phone call.

text: Awesome job! So glad that my daughter found this company. They came and cleaned my mother's house from top to bottom. Even cleaned out the fridge. Left the house shinny and smelling wonderful. They gave us the names of the women who would be coming which put my mother at ease. I will for sure be using them again.

resp.text: We were happy to be of service to you and your mother, Alyson! Thank you for the kind words!

name: Savannah Stanley
text: Hello. I just got a comment under a post I wrote a review for FOUR YEARS AGO. I do not and have never worked for this company. Administration wrote under my comment that I was a previous employee? I was a customer and left a bad review and that was there cover up. I was affiliated with the company being a CUSTOMER not EMPLOYEE. If you own/manage the business and see this id like you to know that when you write a comment under a review get your facts straight. Have a great day! 🙂

resp.text:
Hello, Savannah. Our sincere apologies for any confusion. We really would like to clear this up with you. Our policy is to follow up with each and every one of our clients after every appointment to make sure that they are happy with their service. This is an important part of how we maintain excellent relationships with our clients and resolve any issues that may arise. However, when we first read your 1-star review, we attempted to reach out to you to see what had gone wrong so that we could fix it for you. But upon looking into our CRM system, we found no record at all of ever having performed service for a "Savannah Stanley". Perhaps, you booked your service under a different name? We did, however, have a Savannah S. who had recently stopped working with us, which is why we reached the conclusion we did.

Although 4 years have passed, we would sincerely like to know how we could have improved your experience and would love the opportunity to make you a happy customer moving forward. The owner, Kirsten Rand, can be reached at our Mobile office if you would like to speak with her personally. Thank you and have a wonderful day.

name: N Holliday
text: The girls always do a fantastic job. I really love the way at least one member of the team has been to my house before and knows my preferences. It makes the visit very efficient and personalized!

resp.text: We appreciate you and are thrilled to be your go-to when you need your house cleaned!

name: Jennifer Jones
text: These ladies are incredible!! They scheduled a last minute deep cleaning of my parents house. They even accomodated our need for bleach cleaning due to my dad having surgery! They cleaned everything that we asked for top to bottom and it looks fantastic!! It was a great team of ladies! Thank you so much! We will definitely be using them again!

resp.text: We are happy to have been able to help, Jennifer! Thank you for the kind review and best wishes to you and your sweet family!

name: Alana Bell
text: Very friendly and courteous. One of the ladies was in training so the other lady was doing most of the work and trying to train her as well. Unfortunately, the cleaning was not the best, possibly as a result. Attention to detail not there.

resp.text: We're sorry to hear that there were areas we could have improved upon and appreciate your feedback. It helps us become the best that we can be!

text:
The ladies who came from Maids a la Mode were early but didn't bother me because they were early!  They bring all their supplies and explained what they would use.  We reviewed my priorities and expectations and they went right to work.  They were very personable, polite, and respectful.
They went right to work and worked consistently with only one water break for 3.5 hours.  The house smelled great when they were done.  Everything  was shining and all the surfaces clean (I had asked for special attention to woodwork, blinds, Windows) and shiny!  I thought their rates were very reasonable and I was quite happy with their work.  Annie and Miracle did great work!  Thank you Kiersten!

We are very sorry to learn that you were unhappy with your deep cleaning service yesterday. We do our best to make sure that all of our customers’ expectations are met. Kirsten Rand, Owner

name: Mike Alexander
text: I provided this review to the company in Nov 2020 and never heard a word back from them.  It is now Jul 2021 so now I am posting here:  I really did not want to leave this review as I really liked the technician that worked at my house as a person.  And I am not requesting that anything be done to make things right.  I am good at this point.  The job that was done on the tile floors was good (with one exception noted later).  What makes me unhappy is when I have to do work to clean up after a job is done.  I was a bit bothered right away when I noticed that the technician was leaving boot prints everywhere he walked on my hardwood floors on his way to the tile floors he was cleaning.  I didn't say anything as he was just starting, and I thought maybe it would be taken care of.  He worked hard and did a good job on the tile floors (with the one exception I will note later).  Once he was finished and was removing the corrugated water line and the machines, rancid smelling water was spilled in some areas on my hardwood floors.  Also, while pulling the corrugated water line out of the house, he pulled it around the corners of a room scuffing the baseboards.  I had to put my foot between the baseboard and the line so it would stop hitting the baseboard.  This prevented it from doing any noticeable damage.  He did bring in a wet mop and attempted to clean the hardwood area but did nothing more than smear the rancid smelling water around which dried leaving a VERY noticeable film on the floor.  I had to clean a fairly large area of the hardwood floor twice to remove the dried, rancid water and most of the smell.  As noted above (the one exception) I also mopped the tile floors he cleaned with vinegar and water as some of the quarter round in the tile floor area had filth on it and I figured some of that floor probably had some of the same rancid water on it.  The rancid water smell stayed in the house for more than a day.  The second cleaning of the hardwood floors and time got rid of the rest of it.   My bet is that the machines and/or the water line contained the rancid water from other jobs.  I really hate leaving comments like this, but it is probably important that the company be made aware of these type of issues for training purposes.

text: We highly recommend Zerorez Huntsville and Technician Ed for their hard work, integrity, and expertise! Zerorez is a multi-step process and we learned a lot about the longterm effects of untreated or partially treated pet urine and the downside of commercial enzyme products. We now know how to spot clean in a much better way. Our cream microfiber chair and all 4 carpets look and smell brand new! The results were well worth the price!

resp.text: Thank you for sharing your Zerorez experience Kathy! And you bring up a great point about our pricing compared to traditional carpet cleaners. It is true that we are not the least expensive carpet cleaner in Huntsville, but our patented cleaning technology does provide a better long term value. The difference is our certified zero residue cleaning process. We will explain: with traditional carpet cleaners, soaps and detergents are combined with hot water extraction to clean and sanitize carpets. And although this is a tried and true process, it has a big problem; it's impossible to get all the soap and detergent out of the carpet. And this soapy residue (which can feel a little crunchy under your feet after drying) ends up acting like a dirt magnet which results in spots and traffic lanes reappearing. But with the Zerorez patented process, we do not use soaps and detergents to clean and sanitize carpets but instead a revolutionary, and completely non-toxic, solution called Empowered Water. This process results in a zero residue cleaning, and without residue, carpets stay cleaner, longer. Additionally, they feel softer than you can imagine. Thank you again for your business and fantastic review! We look forward to seeing you again.

name: Lynn Bruce
text: I bought a new home from an elderly woman who had a friend surface clean for her. Because of time restraints, I decided to hire a cleaning service to come in to deep clean before moving in. I explained to the owner that I needed my home deep cleaned and move in ready. The house was completely emptied and easy to maneuver around in. One employee showed up with a helper friend late afternoon. Long story short, they surface cleaned my house. I had to go behind them to ask questions like: "Did you clean the top of the cabinets, did you wipe down doors, did you clean the windows," etc. because it wasn't being done. As I inspected the kitchen, I noticed dried food stuck on the cabinets, dust on top of the cabinets, which I asked them to go back and clean -same experience in the bathrooms. One of the last tasks was mopping the floor. As one lady mopped, I noticed a small puddle of water on the floor, so I wiped it up. I looked at the white napkin in my hand and it was gray. Yes, she mopped my bathroom and kitchen floors with a filthy mop. I brought it to her attention and the second lady mopped behind the first one with another dirty mop. I seriously thought about asking the ladies to leave early, but I overheard one of them talking on the phone (at work) telling the caller that she was trying to make some money and would be home soon. After hearing that, I decided to allow them to finish the job. I paid the $150 but was extremely dissatisfied.

text: I messaged CJ’s on Saturday, had an estimate back from them ASAP: it’s only Thursday and terrible weather for a partially exterior project, and the job is complete already. My windows had dirt, bugs, and cobwebs all over them. They were streaked on the exterior. Now they look brand new, like newly installed. (CJ’s cleaned the interiors of my windows too.) Plus, they pressure washed my badly stained and mildewed walkways and patios making them look like newly poured concrete. From start to finish they were three words — PROFESSIONAL, REASONABLE, and THOROUGH. I have very high expectations for services such as these, and I couldn’t be more pleased. Thank you, CJ’s!

resp.text: Aww thank you Mrs. Kilgore. It was a pleasure doing business with you!

name: Bob Wilson
text: Very pleased with the professionalism, promptness, thoroughness, respectfulness, and friendliness of the owner and staff of CJ's

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Wilson! We look forward to serving you for years to come.

name: Juana Gutierrez
text: I was almost mowed down by an employee. Their blatant disregard for the rules of operating a motor vehicle is sickening. He was on his phone speeding and used no blinker in a construction zone on the interstate and had the audacity to shoot me the bird when I honked to let him know I was on the road. Ridiculous and rude.

resp.text:
Good evening Juana, I want to apologize for the incident earlier. I felt bad for making that Mistake and almost causing an accident. I told my employees I know I scared whoever was in the vehicle and I actually said sorry and threw my hand up (even though you couldn't see me or hear me). I have children too, so I know the feeling even if it wasn't children involved everyone's life is precious and
valuable. I'm sorry for that.  I wasn't on the phone nor was I speeding I was coming on to the highway off the bypass my lane was running out I was near the end a truck had moved over, so I started to move over as well to get on to the highway and you were in my blind spot I didn't see you. I am not a reckless driver nor would I ever risk lives intentionally, i didn't see you in my blind spot I looked twice and was seeing my lane running out, so when the truck moved over to let me in that's when I proceeded to move over not knowing you were back there. I'm happy everyone was and is safe. I do understand your frustration, I would've been to and have been in that situation before. However, I do truly feel you can forgive me for a mistake like I forgave them.

name: Billy Jordan
text: Servpro was awesome. Came out quickly and got our crawl space dried within hours. Recommend them to anybody who needs something done right.

name: Heather McCormick
text:
Do not use this company whatever you do. I had my  rental house flood and it was the worst experience of my life using Serve Pro of Tuscaloosa.I had to call them 3-5 times to even go to the house to get the clean up  process started.Kept being told they was going out to start and when contractors went to give me estimates on repairs there would be no one at the house working on the clean up.They have lied to me several times about my property.Told me several different start and finish dates.They left drying fans in my house 7 days running after they had already cut the drywall and  insulation out. Drew one of the sales guys made up stories about the situation, told my tenant I had told him things when I hadn't even talked to the guy yet and told two different things ones to me and my tenant .I asked Drew why he did this and let him know I would be calling the office and  he proceeded to call my tenant a couple of times and send me a  6 page text over the situation which I found very unprofessional . When I called to complain about this Jacob the owners son took  up for the actions, was rude to me, did not listen to me and acted like I was bothering him.I was told my cabinets needed replaced when they did not. They pulled the vanity out of my master bathroom that did not need pulled out to begin with  without cutting the caulk and when they pulled the vanity it caused the mirror in the bathroom to fall on the sink shattering my mirror and busting my sink in the bathroom and tried to blame it on the heat in the room.I called  David the head of the construction department several times asking a start date and was told no repairs would be started  until they had 18 thousand upfront, Half the cost, and to ask my adjuster to call  his cooperate office and have Fed Ex deliver it to them.I asked my adjuster about it and he said that they did not that money upfront and was beyond shocked I had been told that.They still have their little lock box on my door a week after I told them I will not be using their services anymore, I have called four times to ask to have removed.I have called and asked  three times to speak to the owner of the franchise and got no response. The office staff is not friendly, they have horrible attitudes and make you feel  brushed off.  Brandy the girl in the office is very rude and  blows me off and acts like I'm a bother to her when I call to ask to speak to a manager or owner  . This is the most unprofessional company I have ever came into contact with in my life. And I strongly suggest people think  twice before using them for any reason. You will regret it if you  use this company, trust me on that.They thought since it was an insurance claim they would  take me for a run and rob me and  my insurance company blind and have caused me nothing  but a headache and  added stress from what happened to my home.

Chelsea
don't know how to reply to you  but this way. I too have a  job. Cant answer my phone if I'm busy.I have been trying to contact the owner since June 1st regarding all my issues when they first began.Have called several times .Today is June 20 and first attempt to be reached out to by the owner. You need  new office staff and employees that don't lie to customers and be extremely rude to them. I want my sink and my mirror replaced that was broken courtesy of your employees negligence. Thank you.

resp.text: Good morning Heather, I am deeply sorry you have not had a good experience talking with our staff. I have notified the owner, when we received your yelp review also. It looks like he tried to call about 9:00 am this morning. Please feel free to reach out at any time or email us at servpro8822@servprooftuscaloosa.com. The office has been directed to patch you through to him direct, if he is in during our office hours 8am-5:00 pm. I will follow up with him this afternoon to try and reach you again. I apologize for your less than ideal customer experience during this event in your home. The owner and I would be happy to work with you to figure out where communication errors started and how we can correct them in the future.  - Chelsea

name: Tammy
text:
They were all very sweet and helpful when they came out to our house for a house fire. But then everything got very confusing. We didn't know what was going to happen or when. Then they came in and packed all of our things up, first our clothes and no one told us to keep out any clothes. So we had no clothes blankets or pillows by the time they finished. There was 2 rooms that just had to be cleaned but they threw out our beds and furniture and took out all the carpet. We put notes on two closets and put don't enter.. I found the notes in the floor when we returned. They packed up everything and took it with them but nothing was cleaned it was just in the box they had packed it in.
They told us they we're going to clean the duck work, it was not cleaned, the ceiling fans were not cleaned nor were the blinds. We have had to just  about replace everything  we own plus we had use or own  money to eat at the hotel for   for over 2 months. Being nice is great but we had to many people telling us different things..it took a month after we got to come home before they started bring things back. It made difficult to cook. We had to buy new pots just fry an egg.
When they finally brought things back they were very confused about everything because the young guy and 3 woman that packed us up were fired. They didn't seem to know what was ours and what wasn't.  There are quite a few things missing.  Some of the items are antique and can't be replaced.  The thing is these items problem  went to someone else  and they just saw it was old and not there's. Maybe I need to go check the thrift store.  I didn't think this was going to be easy but this has been a nightmare. I have items that have tags on them, but they didn't take them or clean them. My blinds still have soot on them and it is not easy to clean. They we're supposed to clean and check or duct work , not even touched. And we saw the check our insurance sent them and that was way too much for this mess. This is the first time in 15 years we have made a claim on our house or auto  and now State Farm will not cover our house anymore. So we are going to have to sale our house and move because this put us in the red.

resp.text:
Tammy, I am so sorry for your bad experience with our crews. This is the first we have heard of any issue with your loss. We are trying to look into it internally, but would love for you to call the office at 553-8377 and let us know more so that we can get this issue resolved and make sure everything met to your satisfaction. - Chelsea

Tammy, Thank you for editing your review so that we may have a little insight on why you are unhappy with SERVPRO. I would like to also thank you for your kind words on our crews being "sweet and helpful." I can address that clothing and other textiles were cleaned by another company and not by SERVPRO of Tuscaloosa. We would like you to reach out to our General Manager and Owner at 205-553-8377 when you are comfortable and allow us to address and mend your concerns that we do have control over. Any issues between the claim and your insurance provider will have to be handled through their customer service, as our company does not have direct correlation between your insurance coverage. Again, we are sorry for the headache that was truly in control of our Franchise and the General Manager/Owner would, again, invite you to call and see how we can clear up confusion and give us the opportunity to fix what we are able to.

name: Christina Graham
text:
Please consider this review a PSA! Do NOT use this place. Perhaps if you are a corporate client, they will do well on your job. If you are individual customer, they likely will perform extremely poorly.

I was lied to on a couple of different occasions with my job, in particular about them contacting my insurance and the times that they did so. They typically arrived late (45 min to 1 hour) or on one occasion, they were so late that I was told to not even bother waiting. This was actually after being told by the person managing my job (supposedly managing it) that he thought they were finished up at my place. NOPE! Even after officially signing off that they were done, I brought in another mitigation company...and they are currently finishing the job that ServPro was hired to do.

There are major breaks in communication internally, as well as externally. I wouldn't recommend this company to my worst enemy. Please don't use them and keep them in business any longer.

resp.text: Christina, this is deeply disturbing news to read. We did not know you had any concerns during your experience with SERVPRO of Tuscaloosa. Our office deeply apologizes for your additional distress in your experience with our crews. Residential claims are very important to us as well and we strive to do our best whether we are in a residential home or commercial business. We are very sorry you feel you did not receive our best. Our owners and management are actively investigating your claim file and you will hear from us directly with more questions and information soon. We want to make sure you are taken care of properly and wish that we had known throughout the job process that you were unhappy with the crew in your home.

text: Servpro of Tuscaloosa is the quickest to respond to any type of restoration need you may have.  They're fast and friendly.  I've been in the insurance industry for over 20 years and never seen a more professional group than Servpro.  They will get the job done fast, and get it done right the first time. They do it all, fire, water damage, smoke, cleanup.   Call Justin or Chris 339-5022, they'll take care of you!!!!

name: Wes Graff
text: These people are basically crooks. I had an incident with a customer involving a drain line that leaked into the floor overnight and made a mess. I went out to see the damage myself before we called servpro out to clean it up. It was very minimal water on the floor. The only reason I didn't clean it up myself is because I didn't have a shop vac on my truck and thought it shouldn't cost more than a few hundred dollars to get it cleaned up, even though it was on the weekend, because there just honestly was very little that needed to be done. I was wrong. They charged me over a thousand dollars to do almost nothing besides vacuum up a small amount of water. Then on top of that they left their water bucket in the hallway over the weekend. It leaked water into the stairwell and ruined some of my clients ceiling tiles. When confronted about this Servpro management said that their bucket doesn't leak and that they were not going to replace the tiles. Please do not contact Servpro, they will take advantage of you on every turn.

name: LP
text: Professional Staff!  Very helpful and knowledgeable.

name: amy bentley
text: Can't say enough about the professionalism and service we received from ServPro in Tuscaloosa. Would highly recommend!

name: Thomas Billups
text:
My experience with Servpro of Tuscaloosa has been a nightmare for me and my family.
My 84 years old mother who suffers from Parkinson has been hurt more by Servpro of Tuscaloosa than by the tornado that damaged her home earlier in the year.
My parents used Servpro to store furniture and electronics in order to cleanup and rebuild after the tornado. Furniture stored with Servpro was returned broken, damaged and electronic items like televisions and a crystal chandelier are missing. Six months after they were paid by the insurance company and four months after returning the damaged items Servpro owner Don Elmore has yet to make things right. They are so eager to drum up new customers that they don’t service their current customers. Their customer service stinks.

name: J.R. Cunningham
text:
Worst experience of a lifetime. Lost valuable jewelry, broke a tv, scarred furniture. I asked for them to pay for the things. The answer from Kevin Driggers was, "Mr. Cunningham don't wait for a check from us, if we paid every complaint we'd go broke."
That is about the only true statement I heard from ServPro. They are not members of BBB.
The owner Don Elmore's final word to me were, "just sue me, sue me, I have insurance, sue me."
In my opinion I would never again allow my insurance  company to employ this business, nor could I recommend anything good about them.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words toward our team!

name: Carl Noland
text: Ok

text: Nice

name: A Friend
text: The Serv Pro crew did an excellent job. They were professional and very courteous. Arrived on time and cleaned up when they finished. The entire experience was very good. I highly recommend them to anyone needing this type of service.

name: Dominique Vickers
text: Ms. Jennie is hands down the best! She walks you through every inch of the process to make sure you have a complete understanding. Very professional and hands on! Highly recommend!

name: Mark Strong
text: Let me start by saying that this is the first time IN MY LIFE that I’ve written a bad review about a business, so the fact I feel strongly enough about this matter to do so should say enough in and of itself. Based off my family’s (ongoing) experience to-date with Servpro of Montgomery, I cannot and would not recommend this business to anyone. Mr./Mrs. Brooks, I kindly ask that you or someone in charge reach out to me in a timely manner.  As a courtesy and to give you a chance to address the issue, I will refrain from posting detailed information of surrounding incidents and the lack of professionalism and timeliness your company has exhibited thus far.  If I do not hear from anyone in a timely manner I will have to share my story in order to help future people hopefully never have to deal with the same issue(s).

resp.text:
Hi, Mark, I am the General Manager, and I am terribly sorry to hear about your family’s experience. We try to maintain the highest standards of service, but clearly that is not what happened here. Please call me at 334-284-1612 at your convenience. I'd like to know what I can do to make things right. If you need anything else please let me know.

Thank you,
Kerry Brooks

name: Lashanda Gaines
text: The entire staff was helpful. There wasn’t a doubt that I wouldn’t be taken care of. They were swift, efficient and thorough during this time.

name: Linda Ross
text: The Servpro representatives worked tirelessly to locate all the water damage and begin the drying out process.  They were professional and friendly, always answering my questions explaining each step as they were worked.  I highly recommend them!

name: Kelsea Garrett
text:
I’m at a loss for words as I write this review, but am hopeful that what happened to our family doesn't happen to someone else.

My grandmother had a horrible fall that was devastating to her life. My  Dad trying to do everything he could in that moment to comfort family took a beautiful handmade silk pastel Turkish area rug to have cleaned.

With loss of family in that moment you don't think clearly especially when it's unexpected.  The rug was dropped off; there was no proof of receipt provided at the time.

The rug is no where to be found and because there was no receipt provided no proof we were told nothing can be done.

Being the price of the rug and sentimental value alone we hired an attorney to contact the store owner, and unfortunately were told there was no proof.

I hope nobody else ever has to have the same experience. Please be sure if dropping off a high ticket item regardless of the emotional state you may be in to get an exchange of a paper trail, the employee’s name, and would even add to take pictures. Beyond disappointed in how the owners have handeled this situation with no effort at all to make any attempt for a resolution.

resp.text: SERVPRO® of Montgomery is sorry to hear of the traumatic experience you and your family have suffered. Knowing what you have been through, it saddens us to know that you feel we have mishandled one of your family heirlooms. As stated in your review, there is no paperwork showing it was delivered to us for cleaning. We value our customers and enforce stringent protocols and procedures for any items entrusted to us. This helps to avoid any confusion or loss. I would like to personally investigate this matter but will need additional information to do so. Please contact our office at 334-284-1612 and ask for Kerry Brooks.

name: Cassie Spears
text: Wish I could give y'all 10 stars!! SUPER prompt, SUPER professional, efficient, effective, and just all around amazing! Ms. Jennie in the office, you have my sincerest thanks! Y'all dispatched an incredible team! God forbid I ever have to have a COVID cleaning again, but if I do, I know who to call!!

name: Amanda Geddie
text: Very great company to hire !!!!!! They were clean and very professional during the whole process!!! Best you can get !!!

name: Dean S
text:
Do you own an older home? You might want to remove the built up dust in your heating/cooling ductwork.
ServPro is an expert cleaning service and the cost of duct cleaning is very reasonable.The technicians, Lamont and Shine showed up promptly at 9AM as scheduled and completed the cleaning in about 4 hours.
Now, the dust on the grilles is gone and air quality has improved. We are very pleased with this firm.Their technicians are thorough and professional.

name: Thomas Gaughran
text: Austin and Jon did an excellent job.

resp.text: Great to hear, we strive to please!

name: Linda Finney
text: The adjuster was very prompt coming to see damage. I was pleased and look forward to hearing start date.

name: Judy Van Luchene
text:
Several days after the house was empty, we stopped to see the progress...nothing.  For two weeks, we checked every
day, no workmen.  We were assured we would be back in by Christmas.  We went through three Project Managers, and
three different set of drywall and painters.  The first painting crew stood on my washer and dryer to paint the
ceiling in the laundry leaving dents and scratches.  We had stored the liquor from our bar in tubs in the garage,
as Servpro would not remove alcohol from the home.  Apparently the painters had found it and consumed a great deal
before they were removed from the job by Darin Ingle.  They also got paint all over our floors so Servpro brought
in commercial scrubbers which removed the finish on all of our floors.

To shorten this story, I will cut to the return home.  We finally returned to our home in early March with work still
going on, Painting and damaged floors. The first night home the water under the sink of my brand new cabinets
flooded the kitchen.  They had to send in dryers and a plumber who said it was not hooked up correctly and
reworked all of the kitchen dishwasher and sink plumbing. They sent in a professional flooring company  to assess
the floors. Their solution required us to move back into a hotel for at least a week so they could clean, reseal
the tile and recolor the grout.

The only thing that saved this project was Darin Ingle who arrived on the project in February.  Darin was sent in from another state to resolve the
problems at the Montgomery location that included our home.  Darin took the reins, brought in new crews and came
every day to ensure the work got back on track and that it was done correctly.  Darin's arrival was months into
the project and while we have never sued anyone, we were on the verge of doing just that to get another company
to come in so we could go home.  I am not sure if Servpro's executives realize that Darin not only saved our project,
saved them from a lawsuit but did an amazing job saving their reputation.  I would only call them again if Darin Ingle handled the job.
Because of Darin, I am giving Servpro a 2 star rating and Darin a 5.

An update to my review.  I was contacted by Mr. Bowen, an owner.  Mr. Bowen was determined to do something to do something for All we had been through.  He offered to send in a crew or something.  While his offer was appreciated, we had already fixed many of the issues and did not feel we could ensure another work crew I agreed to think it over and get back with him.  The one thing, as I explained to him, that distressed me everytime I went into the laundry was the dents and scratches on the tops of the washer and dryer which he eagerly agreed to replace.  With much of manufacturing shut down for long periods, appliances are in short supply.  However, Mr. Bowen and Darin Ingle were able to replace order And have new ones installed.  My frustration is no longer renewed when I walk into my laundry room.  My thanks to Mr. Bowen for reaching out and making this a better experience, and to Darin Ingle for making it happen.  It is good to know they cared to make things better.

resp.text:
Hi Judy, I am one of the owners and I am terribly sorry to hear about your experience. We try to maintain the highest standards of service, but clearly that is not what happened here. Please call me at 334-284-1612 at your convenience. I'd like to know what I can do to make things right. If you need anything else please let me know.

Thank you,
Bruce Bowen

I'm just going to buy a rug and cover it up. We weren't satisfied at all. I gave 3 stars because they previously serviced our carpets and they did a good job.

name: Jennifer Needham
text: DO NOT USE THEM FOR TILE CLEANING AND GROUT SEALING! Paid for tile cleaning and grout sealing. Crew had to come out 3 times in one day to attempt to fix and finish. First, they forgot to seal the shower that we paid $90 for them to do. Then, we noticed a film all over every single tile that would not come up; Technician did NOT allow the tile and grout to dry before spraying grout sealer..Then, did not wipe off the excess grout sealer, just left it all over each and every tile. 3rd trip out of same day to day to try and fix it, they used every chemical, scrubber machine, everything they had to try and get it off, guess what, didn't work. So now, my grout is wet UNDER the sealer, which never had proper curing time, because they did not let the grout dry before applying, and my tiles have giant stains, splotches, blobs all over every single one because they did not remove the sealer from the tile after spraying the grout. And on top of it, one of the technicians decided that no, all of my white grout was actually completely stained before they got here that's why it's dark (Not because it was wet, which was the case)..He ended up arguing with me and cursing at me. So corporate will be getting a call this afternoon. Floors look 10x worse than what they did before they were out. Mind you, this was over a $450 job.

resp.text: Hi Jennifer, thank you for taking the time to post a review about your recent experience using Stanley Steemer. We want you to know that we value you as a customer and are truly sorry that you have been inconvenienced in this way. We would like to learn more about your experience and to see if there is anything that we can do to restore your faith in Stanley Steemer. Please email us to customerrelations@steemer.com with your address, zip code and phone number associated with your account or contact us at 1-800-783-3637 ext. 4903. Once we have located your account, someone from management will be in contact with you. Thank you again for bringing this to our attention and we look forward to hearing back from you.

text: Very quick response time.  I requested carpet cleaning online and the next day, the cleaning crew was here on time, and I'd been given a courtesy call to make sure we'd be here. We've used Stanley Steamer for years, but haven't had carpet again until recently, and I'm pleased to say we'll use them again.

name: Denise Cook
text:
The very first thing I told the crew was that there were three cats in the house and they were not to be let outside. The next thing I knew they had my door standing wide open. This should have been communicated to me at the time of my warning so I could have locked up the cats at that time rather than going into mass panic.

I guess I was expecting too much from the tile cleaning. Though they spent a good two hours pre treating and then steaming the tiles didn’t look any better from when I used my own home steam cleaner, except in the areas where the washer and dryer previously sat in my laundry room.

resp.text: Hi Denise, thank you for taking the time to post a review about your service using Stanley Steemer. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused you. We are forwarding your concerns to the local franchise manager. That way if for some reason they are not already aware of it, they can look into this concern. Please email us to customerrelations@steemer.com and include your address, zip code and phone number associated with your account. That way we can be sure we are contacting the correct Stanley Steemer location. Once again, we do apologize for any inconvenience this has caused you and we look forward to looking into this as quickly as possible. Thank you again for choosing Stanley Steemer.

name: Janet W
text: I am blown away at how amazing this company and it's employees are.  I had some damage to my ceramic tile and scheduled an appt over the internet.  The app said they were available at 8AM on Monday (and this was 8PM on Sunday.  I tried scheduling, thinking they would call and say they needed to set me up at another time.  Instead, I got a call at 8:10AM saying a team was on the way.  Dane and his partner were AWESOME.  They were worried that they would not be able to correct the damage I had done,  so Dane went into great detail about what to expect (he did not want me to be disappointed).  After much discussion, I told him to "go for it".  He did a superb job of fixing what I had messed up with his corrective cleaning technique.  He cleaned to rest of the floor sparking clean and fresh.  The results were much better than I expected and I am very happy with his hard work and diligence in making certain I was fully informed about potential upside and downside of the process.  It was quick, convenient and more than lived up to my expectations.  Would give this team and all of Stanley Steemer 10 stars if possible.

name: Darin Bashaw
text: Watch their pricing and get quotes. They are already 50% more than competition for normal service. Deodorant or other add-ons will double the price. And if you dare to ask for tile or other hard surface cleaning and the price will be triple what carpets would cost. I was shocked by that bill. Didn't make sense so I asked and couldn't get a satisfactory reason why the hard surfaces were so much more expensive, except 'that's our price, that's always been our price.' Well these prices just don't seem reasonable to me. Otherwise, can't fault the service. As a commercial company, we need affordable and predictable prices and find these elsewhere.

resp.text: Hi Darin, thank you for taking the time to bring this to our attention. In an effort to stay competitive Stanley Steemer monitors various consumer reports to help determine how their pricing compares. Although our pricing may not always be lower than our competitors, we are confident that they cannot match our quality of service. We are forwarding your concerns along to the managers at the local Stanley Steemer office, that way if for some reason they are not already aware of it they can look into this.

Carpet to be cleaned was original to our 2006 home, no kids no pets, just normal wear/tear. Kind of a neutral beige color.

They checked out the areas to be cleaned, asked if we had any special concerns (which we did and they addressed) and they went right to work. In what we considered a short time, they were done and invited us to inspect their work. Asked again if we had any concerns.
10-min later we had paid, they had picked up their equipment and were gone. Painless.
We WILL have these guys back to clean carpets in our motorhome.

name: Carli Parrish
text:
I just purchased a home and wanted the carpets cleaned before I moved my things into the home. I hired Stanley Steemer to come out on the day of closing. I could’ve rented a carpet cleaner from Publix and taken my time to clean my carpets and would’ve had a better result. I thought hiring professionals would save me time and I would have professionally cleaned carpets. Unfortunately that didn’t happen, they rushed and left dirty spots that I later cleaned myself. Not to mention they didn’t touch the areas around the base boards. I wasted over $300!
Update!
I received a call this morning and it’s was explained that my carpets had been neglected and that’s was why the carpets looked unclean. I really appreciate that fact that Stanley Steemer took the time to respond to my complaint!

resp.text: Hi Carli, thank you for taking the time to bring this to our attention. We do apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused you. We are forwarding this information along to the managers at the local Stanley Steemer office that way if for some reason they are not already aware of it they can look into this matter and contact you directly. We have located your account information, to ensure we are contacting the correct location. Please email us at customerrelations@steemer.com (mailto:customerrelations@steemer.com) if you have any further questions or concerns. Once again, we do apologize for any inconvenience this has caused you and we look forward to looking into this as quickly as possible. Thank you again for choosing Stanley Steemer.

name: Amanda Boles
text: I applied for a position that fit my schedule perfectly via Facebook.  Last Thursday Nadia Mathieu contacted me and we agreed on an interview date and time.  Monday August 31 at 8 am.  I have another job that started at 9, however I was honest with Nadia about that.  I arrived at the office Monday morning at 745.  I waited until 750 and went to the door.  I rang the bell.  Older lady came to the door and I informed her I was there to interview with Nadia at 8.  She then informed me Nadia would not arrive at work until 9 due to unknown reasons.  I was shocked.  I understand things happen.  So ok I left a message with the lady to ask Nadia to call me.  I waited most of the day on her call.  I emailed her that afternoon.  I expressed my continued interest in the position and asked could we schedule another interview.  Now Thursday I didn't receive any response from Nadia.  I received email today from Office Pride stating I didn't met the requirements from r the position I applied for and they decided to go in a different direction.  Wow seriously!  How is that possible when I didn't even interview.  At this point, I'm furious they would decline me for a position I know I'm qualified for.  So I called the office and spoke to Nadia.  She apologized for her not showing up.  I asked her why she couldn't communicate with me after she arrived at the office and realized she missed the interview.  This company is awful and I would never work for them.  They declined to consider me for the position due to her missing the interview.

resp.text: Amanda, you couldn’t have known this but Nadia had a car accident while traveling to work that morning.  You were excluded from consideration because of the way you conducted yourself when you were tragically inconvenienced.  That was more effective than any interview we could have done. Thanks for your consideration

name: Chica Llorona
text: We are new to the area, and Office Pride helped my sister who is hearing impaired (deaf). They worked with her and the Recruiter Andrea even conducted the interview by writing back and forth with my sister. it shows just how compassionate they are In helpinh people succeed. Thank you very much.

resp.text: Chica thank you for your review.  Our mission is to honor God by positively impacting people and workplaces. I am so glad we could be a positive impact for your sister.  We are very glad to have her as part of our team.  Thank you!

name: Dustin George
text: Office Pride has been so great to work with. From the initial estimate, to scheduling, to all of the work being done, they have truly been a pleasure to work with. The employees were very nice and professional. I have zero complaints and would highly recommend them to any business.

resp.text: Dustin, I am pleased your experience was very positive.  Thank you and thanks for the recommendation

name: Cadence Davis
text: Office Pride is the worst janitorial place to work for! I kept the office that I was assigned to neat and tidy, but I still felt unappreciated and unvalued. I worked for a dialysis clinic called Fresenius for 3 months and the RN manager named Wendy always called and complained to Office Pride and I’m not saying she’s wrong for complaining but at that point I felt like she didn’t want me there so she found any reason to tell them to get rid of me but they ended up to replacing me and tried to  put me somewhere else so i decided to resign from the company instead. Office Pride is the company that will take the company’s side before they take will the employee side that works for them. For example, Fresenius will call the office and complain and get upset, but if I call and complain about them not having supplies they will not do anything. Also, Office Pride is very lazy when it comes to bringing supplies to each account. Of course, I made mistakes but I took full accountability for it and did my best to fix it. We all can’t please everyone and everyone will not like you. Office Pride you’re suppose to be a “Christian” environment but is totally the opposite. No, I’m not bashing the company I’m just giving my honest opinion. Hate it or Love it.

name: Larry Vaughan
text: Top notch people, top notch service.

name: Willie Tucker
text: My experience with Office Pride in Madison started around 4 years ago.  A representative visited my office and initially I was reluctant to listen as I didn't want the added expense of a cleaning service.  This was something that I had been taking care of for my office for a few years.  After consideration, I decided to use Office Pride for my janitorial service to take the burden off of me.  After a few years, I was approached by a friend to provide the same services at the same price I was paying with Office Pride so I switched.  Bad mistake.  After about 6 months, I ended up calling Kathy and signing back up with Office Pride.  I'll never make that mistake again.  Office Pride does a very thorough job and I never have to worry about cleaning my office myself anymore.  They send out a representative at least once per month to make sure that I am satisfied with the job that they are doing as well as doing their own visual inspection.  Very satisfied client!

name: Lita Alford
text:
We are a small company in Huntsville, AL comprised mostly of male workers.  After several BAD experiences personally and business wise with janitorial/cleaning services, I was extremely sensitive to cost, honesty, expectations, workability, and work ethics.
After mentioning the condition of the bathroom floors to our cleaning lady, on a few occasions – sticky, dirty looking, etc., she up and quit.  I started cleaning our office suite – approx. 1800 sq. ft. with 3 bathrooms.  All the while, I was looking for “that perfect cleaning company” that would not cost the company a small fortune.
Sitting at a Taco Bell eating lunch in my car, I looked up and saw a car with “Office Pride Commercial Cleaning” sign on the door.  And the rest, as they say, is history.  I left a voice mail message; received a prompt reply to set up a site visit.  Lee Weeks came to our office with a professional demeanor, marketing folder filled with any information I could ask for; a sincere desire to meet my expectations (which are extremely high) and our company’s budget.
Their first cleaning to “bring our office up to their standards” was phenomenal.  I appreciate the fact they use color coded cloths for specific areas; leave their vacuum cleaner here (not transferring dust/dirt from other offices), and provide cleaning supplies.  Cathy (operations manager) is great – always accommodating and understanding that we are the customer.
Cathy, Lee, Patricia, Leigh Ann, Susie + others strive to meet and exceed our company’s janitorial requirements.  I appreciate their desire to meet our expectations, their dependability, work ethics, and overall attitude.  It is so refreshing in this day and age to experience outside entities that do what they say they will do!

name: Janet L Hunter
text: Nice,  Professional, Christian Company

name: Rhodia Chaplin
text: As a facility manager, I must ensure that every vendor that I select provide professionalism, honesty, integrity, and commitment to doing what's right.  For the type of business we operate individuals must be scrutinzed through security before they can enter the facility.  When I first interviewed with Troy Hopkins it was a spiritual connection when he stated that his company put God 1st.  Not do they put God 1st, but they also do a background check on their employees. Knowing this gave me assurance & a peace of mind in the services they would render for my company.  After we walked through the entire office, I received a packet of information explaining everything that was discussed during the walk thru.  I went from a previous vendor providing 5-8 employees to clean our building to one individual when I switched over to Office Pride. The work performed Monday - Friday was exceptional.  Not only was our building spotless, but this one individual also maintained our cleaning supplies inventory. There was never too much or too little stock.  Once a month a supervisor would come out to do a white glove inspection of the work that was being done by their employee. The price is right for impeccable service provided.  Awesome staff to work with!

name: J Mc
text: I have been using Office Pride since nearly the day that they started in Huntsville, and have continued to utilize them for their commercial cleaning services through a variety of employers / businesses and office spaces; My good experiences with them go back more than 10 years, and I will certainly say that I am totally satisfied with the work that they do. Our office space is clean, well-kept, and organized, and in the Architecture-Engineering-Planning business, the office space presentation that we put forth is incredibly important - or clients can tell by the presentation of our own space how we will treat and value their space. Office Pride is an integral element of our program, and I would surely recommend their services to anyone in the market.

name: Brittany McCowan
text:
I wouldn’t trust anyone besides Office Pride for our janitorial needs.

Our janitor, Pam, is an absolute gem and is willing to go the extra mile. She got on her hands and knees to clean our hardwood stairs when there were spills. She is always on the lookout for anything amiss (i.e. loose banister, water pressure issues, supplies shortage, etc.) and promptly alerts our staff. Plus, Pam leaves the nicest notes to start our work week.

A big thank you to Pam and the Office Pride team in Madison!

name: Amy Guerin
text:
Our company has been in the Huntsville area for over 20 years and have used several of the local cleaning services before switching to Office Pride.  We have been using Office Pride for over eight years and have always received excellent service and support throughout that time.  The staff at Office Pride are always professional, courteous and willing to accommodate our janitorial needs in a timely manner.

Because they are committed to providing excellent service, the Office Pride Team conduct a monthly inspection (walk-through) of our facility in order to stay on top of our cleaning requirements.  During this inspection, they meet with the staff to discuss any issues we may be having or areas that may need improvement.  I am happy to say we never have any to report because their staff always do a thorough job.

I would highly recommend them for all your cleaning needs.  You can be confident that your business and facility will be well taken care of and in good hands with a professional cleaning staff.   Office Pride will strive to meet or exceed your janitorial service needs.

name: Queen Isaac
text: Only hire Hispanics and Whites (BLACK Females not welcomed)... RUDE & unprofessional Andrea is not qualified just as she wasn't for Automation at LG ELECTRONICS. This company doesn't deserve not even  one🌟.

resp.text: Ashley (Queen), I wanted to reach out and respectfully ask you be fair and professional when leaving reviews.  You know we have actually offered you several positions you turned down.  I recommend being more flexible with your availability and/or the tasks you are willing to perform. If you knew anything about our workforce, you wouldn't make such inaccurate claims. I see you have a history of leaving one star reviews for other businesses. Maybe try a more positive approach?  All the best in your future endeavors.

name: Rush Dickson
text:
"I wanted to take the time to give my two-cents worth about Office Pride. Their employees are efficient, polite and on time. My tenants always comment that they know when Office Pride has been there to clean as they leave such a clean smell behind. I am a project manager, located in Virginia Beach, VA and as such, it is a great feeling knowing I do not have to worry that the work is not being done to my satisfaction. I recently needed special light bulbs for the restrooms and Office Pride took it upon themselves to go purchase the bulbs for me which is not in their job duties. It is great to have a company go that extra mile!"

--Melaney Cubilla, Carothers Park

name: Jamie Turgeon
text: I first became aware of Office Pride a few years ago when the president and CEO, Troy Hopkins, walked into our small office building. He is a very personable man and after briefly explaining what his company offers; he left me with some brochures to read over. At the time, we were unsatisfied with the current janitorial service we had and when he followed back up, it was clear that it was time to make a move. It didn’t hurt that we were getting more bang for the buck - Office Pride’s prices were lower and they would be coming more often.  Another bonus is that each month an inspection is performed. Office Pride sends over one of their reps to come in and check over our facility to double check the quality of cleaning. Any time I have ever had to call Office Pride for anything, they are very responsive.  In addition, they have a customer appreciation luncheon each year which is a very nice perk. We are very satisfied with their service and would recommend them to any company looking for a top notch janitorial service in the Huntsville area.

name: Lisa Garland Segroves
text:
Office Pride Stands Out From Other Commercial Cleaning Services

Our office spent several years trying to motivate and survive several corporate cleaning services before finding the attentive, professional couple who cleaned for our company. When they told us they were moving to another state, the thought of going back to sub-par service, and valuable time spent each week going over what needed to be cleaned was depressing. Working for a company that supports sustainability and "green" practices, I started the search by looking for green cleaning companies in the Huntsville AL area, and Office Pride was at the top of the results list. After reading the Core Beliefs statement on Office Pride's website and meeting with the Huntsville office manager, we decided to give them an opportunity to show us the difference between Office Pride and other corporate services, and we are truly pleased with the results. We have received consistent, responsive, quality service from Office Pride of Huntsville at a very fair price. Office Pride's carpet cleaning service rescued us with top-notch, professional service at Christmas with a last minute carpet cleaning two days before our annual open house, securing a place in our annual Christmas prep for many years to come. Because of the quality of service we have received in our Huntsville office, we contacted Office Pride of Nashville when the time came to hire a service for our new branch office. We are grateful for the weekly service we receive from Office Pride and look forward to many years of partnership.

name: Jennie Collier
text: Have not heard back

text: Very helpful

resp.text: Angelina,  I am sorry you have had a less than satisfactory experience with Office Pride.  I have done some research and cannot ascertain who you are or what company you represent. Would you kindly provide me those details and more specifics about your experience?

text: I would definitely recommend rainbow international they were very professional and so friendly to work with! resp.text: Thank you for the 5 stars! We really enjoyed working for you!

resp.text: Thank you Debbie for the kind words! We appreciate being able to help you out by drying your wet floors.

name: Colby Duckett
text:
I used rainbow international to help with a moisture condensation issue in my crawlspace that caused some water damage to the floor as well as some mold growth in the crawl space. They were very responsive and professional throughout the inspection, estimate, and remediation process.

They gave me appropriate information to help me determine what option was the best quality and value for my specific situation.

They performed a mold remediation treatment, installed a dehumidifier in the crawl space, replaced the crawl space door, and sealed the crawl space vents with cover that I provided, and all for a very reasonable price.

I would certainly use Rainbow International again for a situation similar to this one, and I would recommend their serviced to others in this situation as well.

resp.text: Thank you so much Mr Duckett! While we hope you don’t Need our services again, we’re Always Here for any Water,Fire, or Mold disasters anyone may have.

name: Heather Thomas
text: This company came to dry up water damage. The young men were kind, respectful, & wonderful at their job! Not only did they pay attention to detail, they were very calming during a very emotional process. I would recommend them to anyone!

resp.text: Thank you Heather! We hope the reconstruction will go smoothly for you!

name: madyson cotton
text: The service was excellent and involved the removal of flooring and set of equipment to dry  wet plywood in three rooms. The men were very professional and polite and answered all my questions about the services being performed. I was told when they would come back and was called about 20-40 minutes before they came. I was very pleased with them and the services performed. Thank you so much to Matt, Tre and Luke.

resp.text: Thank you for your review, we really appreciate it! We are glad we got to help you out with the water damage from your fridge. Hope the installation of your new flooring goes well.

name: Wade Farley
text: It was a great experience with Rainbow during a crazy day.  We had a pipe burst and flood our home.  Matt was there as soon as he could be. Matt made sure everything was dry to the point of no mold or mildew before he was finished. He was very professional and personable throughout the situation, even though we were a little crazy. Thank you Matt and Rainbow International for helping us through these past few crazy days and helping us get life back to normal.

text: Initially, I would have given them a higher rating.  However, I had the carpet cleaned for 3 bedrooms and 7 steps for $150. The boy was very polite. They looked really good when he got done. I wouldn't waste my money.

resp.text: We regret that you are not fully satisfied. You may be experiencing something known as "wicking". We would be happy to clean those spots again if you choose. And we do offer other packages that include moving the furniture in rooms. Just let us know if you would like us to clean these spots again.

name: JoDean Smith
text: Heaven's Best came highly recommend and lived up to every expectation. They were on time, very personable, and reasonably priced. I will call them again!

resp.text: Thank you so much for reviewing us & giving us 5 Stars, Miss Smith! We love to live up to our expectations, and we strive to live up to our name "Heaven's Best" every time we clean. We appreciate your business and hope to clean for you for many years to come. Ann & Steve Mobley

name: Tracy Colvin
text: Steve came to my house, and spent at least 30 minutes loving on all of my 6 small dogs...they loved him!!😀  What a nice guy!!  He cleaned my carpet very professionally, and it dried very quickly!!  He did an awesome job! And cheaper than the other expensive company here in Birmingham that gouges with outrageous costs!! I will definitely use him again and again!

resp.text: Thanks so much for taking the time to give us a review!  We love dogs at Heaven's Best Carpet Cleaning.  That is one of the reasons we started this business.  We have 2 mini dachshund's and we love them, but we don't like some of the messes they make.  We realized that there are many people just like us, who love their pets and need help cleaning their carpets at an affordable rate.  We understand that budgeting is often tight, so we try to give a good value for our services.  We would love to clean for you again and I am sure Steve would love to visit with your dogs again.  Thanks again for letting others know!  We are definitely a pet-loving company!

text: They did such an amazing job!  They were very professional, but also very friendly.  My couch smells wonderful and it didn't take long at all. resp.text: Hi Lyndsay, Thanks so much for letting others know about our service! We are so glad to hear from another happy customer. Please call us when you are ready to have your carpets cleaned. We appreciate you taking the time to leave us a review! Ann & Steve Mobley

name: Brandy Waters
text: We were moving & desperately needed our carpets cleaned (2 small kids, 2 dogs & a cat - you can imagine the damage), but we were on a short time frame. With only a few days notice, these guys came out & deep cleaned our carpets AMAZINGLY! Seriously, our house looks SO much better thanks to them! I’ve never had the pleasure of interacting with a company with such exceptional communication skills either! They emailed/texted to confirm my appointment, called/texted when they were on the way (100% on time, btw) and went over every detail of our bill BEFORE beginning so we wouldn’t be surprised by anything. If you need your floors clean, you can’t go wrong by choosing them!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your AWESOME GOOGLE REVIEW!  We love to hear that we did a good job and that we communicated well throughout the cleaning process.  And, we strive to make our customers happy and to live up to our name "Heaven's Best" every time we clean!  So, we are glad to hear that we are getting the job done. We will pass your comments on to our technicians who are rewarded for their hard work. Thanks for your business & review! We hope to clean for you again! Sincerely, Steve & Ann Mobley - Owners
